@description.name: @description
@description.body: Exposes PluginDetectPDFjs to qooxdoo. Contains detection for PDF.js which is a Portable Document Format (PDF) viewer that is built with HTML5. PDF.js is built into Firefox 19+ and used as default viewer there. You can enable/disable it via "about:config" and "pdfjs.disabled" (true/false). As soon as there is an official way to detect this, which seems to be worked on [1][2], we should switch. [1] https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/showbug.cgi?id=840439 [2] https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=558184 This class is used by {@link qx.core.Environment} and should not be used directly. Please check its class comment for details how to use it.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: callback {Function} The callback function which should be called.
@param.description: The callback function which should be called.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: context {Object} The context object for the callback function.
@param.description: The context object for the callback function.
